# FormatFlagsAreAllClear

**Enumeration Case**

A value indicating that all format flags are clear.

## Declaration

```swift
FormatFlagsAreAllClear
```

## Discussion

This constant preserves `0` as the wild card value.

## Special Purpose Flags

- **LinearPCMFormatFlagsAreAllClear**: A value indicating that all PCM format flags are clear.

items.description: A value indicating that all PCM format flags are clear.
items.name: LinearPCMFormatFlagsAreAllClear
